name: df-phtpc
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cphtpc, cmpt(s0, ctop, copab(s1, s2, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), co(cii, ccn, cv(s0))), wne(co(cv(s1), cfv(cphtpy, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), emptycls)))))
comment: Define the function which takes a topology and returns the path homotopy relation on that topology. Definition of [Hatcher] p. 25. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2014.)
